content.rendered:
Elevar’s Accounting Partner Program Will change the way you work for your clients

Accounting involves many tasks that are crucial and are time-consuming. While accounting firms want to focus on scaling their practice, these time-driven tasks keep them occupied. It’s always suggested to handover these time-consuming tasks to those with excellent team adhering to the rules and doing the work for you allowing you to focus on your core business.

We have got the list of services where we synergize with Partners by allowing them to offer more services to clients and helps them to grow their business.

Services

  • Cleanup and catchup services
  • Daily Bookkeeping
  • General ledger review
  • Monthly Workpapers and Management Accounts
  • Review & compilation of financial statements
  • Payroll processing and management
  • Sales tax and Department of labor compliance
  • Annual tax preparations
  • Integration with multiple tools and application
  • Migration from one accounting software to another
Get Started Now
